title: Graduates and Dean’s Lists · Angelo State University
description: View the ASU Graduates and Dean’s Lists, share your achievements with friends and family, and create a press release to send to your local media.

paragraphs: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASEDate:Contact: Office of Communications and MarketingEmail:communications.marketing@angelo.edu
Share now with your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter, or click the “Printable Version” button to generate a personal press release to send to your local media outlet.
City Markersindicate cities represented in the current list.
list_items: Select which list you would like to see (all Graduates or Dean’s List) and click Get List.
Use the search field or scroll to find your name on the list.
Click your name to generate a personal press release to send to your local media outlet, or share now with your friends and family on Facebook and Twitter.
Select a map marker to filter the list by that city.
Selected markers are shown in green.
Click multiple markers to add them to the selection.
Click selected markers again to remove them from the selection.
Click anywhere on the map to select pins within a 50 mile radius.
Click and drag the side handles to resize the selection.
Click and drag the center handle to move the selection.
Click pins inside the radius to remove them from the selection.
Click pins outside the radius to add them to the selection.
Click the blue shaded area to remove the selection.
Selected cities appear in tags above the search field.
Click a tag to remove that city from the selection.
